head.supplied: 21/2/93. ¶ ¶ It is very kind of you, dear Miss Walker, to offer me the opportunity of seeing your valuable collection of flower-paintings. It will be a great pleasure indeed. You will find me best fr...

div.p: Am 27/1, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

It is very kind of you, dear Miss Walker, to offer me the opportunity of seeing your valuable collection of flower-paintings. It will be a great pleasure indeed. You will find me best free at my little cottage any afternoon between 3 and 5, except Saturday and Sunday; which are my special study days.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Perhaps I can afford you some information also as regard[s] the plantes, portraited by you. Kindly write a couple of days before, when you are coming, as I have this year an enormous amount of extrawork in the Department to attend to.
